item.title: ThrSqr
item.author: marc@hrmn.dev (Marc Hermann)
item.description: Are you tired of your team’s / choir’s / book club’s (etc.) message group getting cluttered by “Who’s coming?!” messages every week? Then it is time you tried ThrSqr.
